thread.title: Court Construes Claims Directed to Microsurgery Methods and Equipment
thread.title_full: Court Construes Claims Directed to Microsurgery Methods and Equipment

author: Morris James LLP
title: Court Construes Claims Directed to Microsurgery Methods and Equipment
text:
Court Construes Claims Directed to Microsurgery Methods and Equipment more+ Contact 
To embed, copy and paste the code into your website or blog: <iframe src="http://www.jdsupra.com/post/contentViewerEmbed.aspx?fid=81611e12-404e-43f4-b32d-3ebf0e240ee2" width="100%" height="620" frameborder="1" style="border: 2px solid #ccc; overflow-x:hidden !important; overflow:hidden;" scrolling="auto"></iframe> 
Stark, C.J. Claim construction opinion. 
The following terms of U.S. patent No. 5,755,275 were construed: microsurgery An articulated tool support A reference frame R p of a patient/patient reference frame R p A function of the position of a reference frame R p of a patient in the fixed reference from reference frame R c Control position and displacements of the tool as a function of control signals originating from a control unit, where the fixed reference frame R c is independent of the patient reference frame R p and the image reference frame R i determine correspondence of a reference frame R o of the tool with the patient reference frame R p and the image reference frame R i as a function of the signal from the at least two sensors visualization of position of the tool in the image reference frame R i means for determining coordinates of the tool in the fixed reference system R c based on date from the image data base
